item.title: Autotyper
item.dc:creator: @zdarkmage77 zdarkmage77
item.description:
@zdarkmage77 wrote:

Theres a whole ton of things you could add on it for example use

rwait(randomwait),
an array for what you’re gonna say,
add a random random factor (explained later on),
chat with style (glow2:shake:hello;blue:scroll:zomg!;wave2:<>< <>< <>< <>< <>< <><;),
etc.etc. [see below]

program autospam;
var
text: array [1..100] of string;
rr,hobo:integer;
begin
text[1]:='hello every random person out there';
text[2]:='I am the destined';
text[3]:='child chosen to defeat the evil jagex gods';
text[4]:='will you join the brotherhood';
text[5]:=or will you choose to die?';
text[6]:='muhahahahahahaha';
text[7]:='i am zamorak's scourge';
text[8]:='fear me!';
text[9]:='or...';
text[10]:='die!';
repeat
rr:=random(6);
if rr=1 then
begin
hobo:=1;
repeat
wait(100+random(50));
sendkeyswait(text[hobo]+' ',25+random(10),250+random(100));
hobo:=hobo+1;
until(hobo=11);
end;
if rr>1 then
begin
hobo:=7;
repeat
wait(100+random(50));
sendkeyswait(text[hobo]+' ',randomrange(5,15),randomrange(150,250));
hobo:=hobo+1;
until(hobo=11);
end;
until(false);
end.
//I am the destined I am the destined I am the destined I am the destined I am the destined hello every random person out there I am the destined

Runescape cheating help
|
|
|
\ /
www.runescape.com/rules.html (don’t actually go there for ‘cheating help’, lol)

Read full topic

item.title: Autotyper
item.dc:creator: @omg_omg_omg omg omg omg
item.description:
@omg_omg_omg wrote:

program autotyper;
{.include srl\srl.scar}
const
message1 =‘message 1 here’;
message2 =‘message 2 here’;
message3 =‘message 3 here’;
message4 =‘message 4 here’;
message5 =‘message 5 here’;
message6 =‘message 6 here’;
begin
setupsrl;
repeat
typesend(message1);
wait(500+random(100))
typesend(message2);
wait(500+random(100))
typesend(message3);
wait(500+random(100))
typesend(message4);
wait(500+random(100))
typesend(message5);
wait(500+random(100))
typesend(message6);
wait(500+random(100))
until(isfkeydown(2));
end.

this works, but still isn’t very good. I’m going to uberfy it.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2007, 08:57:41 PM[/size][hr]Got it! =P

program autotyper; {.include srl\srl.scar} const message1 ='message 1 here'; //f2// message2 ='message 2 here'; //f4// message3 ='message 3 here'; //f5// message4 ='message 4 here'; //f6// message5 ='message 5 here'; //f7/ message6 ='message 6 here'; //f8// begin //f9 stops the script.// setupsrl; repeat if(isfkeydown(2)) then begin typesend(message1); end else; begin if(isfkeydown(4)) then begin typesend(message2); end else; end; begin if(isfkeydown(5)) then begin typesend(message3); end else; end; begin if(isfkeydown(6)) then begin typesend(message4); end else; end; begin if(isfkeydown(7)) then begin typesend(message5); end else; end; begin if(isfkeydown(8)) then begin typesend(message6); end else; end; until (isfkeydown(9)); end.

Read full topic

item.title: Autotyper
item.dc:creator: @av4td182 av4td182
item.description:
@av4td182 wrote:

Theres a few thing you can do with the script, such as using SendKeys to type the msg (which requires srl). you can make the script type when a certain key is pressed such as f1,f2 etc instead of just quickly repeating a message. then if you ned a challenge use forms and stuff. check out my autotalker, its the first script ive properly finsihed (i think :P).

item.title: Autotyper
item.dc:creator: @geel9 geel9
item.description:
@geel9 wrote:

NOT! I REPEAT NOT! TO BE USED WITH RUNESCAPE!
Unless you’re a homicidal homicide who likes to be homicidally acting

program New; const message1 ='message 1 here'; message2 ='message 2 here'; message3 ='message 3 here'; message4 ='message 4 here'; message5 ='message 5 here'; message6 ='message 6 here'; begin repeat sendkeys(message1 + chr(13)); wait(684) sendkeys(message2 + chr(13)); wait(684) sendkeys(message3 + chr(13)); wait(684) sendkeys(message4 + chr(13)); wait(684) sendkeys(message5 + chr(13)); wait(684) sendkeys(message6 + chr(13)); wait(684) until(false) end.
